A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is more about pandering to politically correct\, progressive notions of gender and racial parity\, than making a good movie.  Disney is more interested in pandering to women and minorities\, two cohorts that they have yet to fully exploit with their tied marketing of toys\, video games\, Happy Meals and whatever other garbage they can foist upon the brainwashed masses.  This movie is a disgrace to the Star Wars franchise.
